description: This treasured baked salmon family recipe ticks all the boxes. Coat salmon pieces in a tasty truffle mustard mixture before baking to amp up the flavour.
name: Baked Salmon With Truffle Mustard Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange lemon slices over the parsley mixture. Bake for 15 minutes for medium, or until cooked to your liking. Remove from oven. Stand for 5 minutes, then serve with salad leaves.
